colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES DMIGS BRTZEM LA BRTEN PA'I RIL BSGRUBS BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL MO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI AA PAG TA CHIN WANG SHOG AU RANG GYI DAD LDAN HA THUN TSE 'PHEL SKYID DANG, PI LIG THU DAR HAN THO YON BLO BZANG DPAL 'BAR DANG, AE RTE NI TA'I CHING KUN DGA' DON YOD, AE RTE NI KU SHR'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN SKYONG RNAMS KYIS GOS DANG MAndAL BCAS PHUL NAS YANG YANG BSKUL TSE, SNGA SOR 'DI 'DRA'I DPE PHYOGS 'DIR MI 'DUG MA DANG, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI MA nI RIL BSGRUBS LA DPE BLANG STE, TSIG BSGYUR DGOS PA @015B RNAMS BSGYUR TE, BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS MTSO BDUN GYI DGON PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GSOL DPON DGE TSUL BLO BZANG STOBS LDAN GYIS BGYIS PA'I 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
